question: With the development of online communication, people will never be alone will always be able to make friends.    To what extent do you agree or disagree?
text: On account of the great innovation of online communication, it is claimed that becoming friends with others doesn’t seem to require a lot of exertion nowadays. Although the virtual world may cause some unexpected consequences, I believe that it can assist us in getting along with different people.

Primarily, it aids us in keeping in touch with each other through technologies. For technological devices such as smartphones or computers, users may easily connect without having to meet face-to-face. Regardless of the geographical distances, staying in touch turns out to be extremely effortless and such benefits can amazingly appease one’s loneliness. For instance, phoning, video calling or chatting are such simple acts that could soothe people’s melancholy and miserable mood.

Secondly, there are various internet sites that can incredibly connects us through the Internet. Online dating websites or social networks, for example, enable users to make friends or search for lovers. Thanks to these phenomenal apps, everyone can find much more convenient and useful methods to befriend or search information about others beforehand. They can positively support one’s mentality by bringing them together and mollifying their negative thoughts through conversations. As it is easier for us to express our secrets, our feeling with a person in the virtual world, one may take off his burden he might be suffering during times.

In conclusion, due to the outstanding progress in machineries, everyone can easily find different ways to stay in touch through online communication. Moreover, technologies are still improving and playing such integral parts in our daily lives for its convenience and effectiveness.
